item.title: 个人简介
item.description: Xingjie Shi (史兴杰), Associate Professor Academy of Statistics and Interdisciplinary Sciences East China Normal University ISI Elected member 现场统计研究会环境与资源统计学会理事 研究方向：组学遗传学统计建模、高维大数据统计计算、生存分析

item.title: Publications
item.description: Yang, Yi\(^\#\); Shi, Xingjie\(^\#\); Zhou, Qiuzhong; Sun, Lei; Yeong, Joe\(^\ast\); Liu, Jin\(^\ast\); SC-MEB: spatial clustering with hidden Markov random field using empirical Bayes, \(\underline{Briefings \space in \space Bioinformatics}\), 2021+, R package Cheng, Qing; Qiu, Tingting; Chai, Xiaoran; Sun, Baoluo; Xia, Yingcun; Shi, Xingjie\(^\ast\); Liu, Jin\(^\ast\); MR-Corr\(^2\): A two-sample Mendelian randomization method that accounts for correlated horizontal pleiotropy using correlated instrumental variants, \(\underline{Bioinformatics}\), 2021, R Package Zhang, Xiao; Liu, Xu; Shi,
